text: Hello everyone. I am Erick and Im new in HubSpot. I need build a template responsive for the email. I know the HTML and CSS, but i dont know use the admin of design. ¿How I can start? thank you
You may want to post any email-related questions in <#CJ5DN6RKP|email-development> and/or <#CES6JU0RY|drag-drop-email-beta>

Hi everyone! I’m Alberto and new to HubSpot CMS Development. Im very familiar with Wordpress and PHP as well as a novice in OOP. I’m looking to learn about the new HubSpot themes as well as how to build both website and landing page templates

I have a question…

1. Can a theme be used for an existing customer / account ? Meaning they have an account and a website built already, along with many different templates, landing pages etc. I am trying to shorten dev time and am wondering if I can use a theme for a new page design that has been requested?  Does it impact other pages? Thanks in advance and happy to be part of the community!
